name: @magnit-ce/code-tests
description: A custom html element that interprets and runs tests in a browser

scripts.test:build:
echo "
This package cannot build tests because tests rely on referencing this package to build.
Vite/rollup's bundler does not allow excluding references to the entry point, and the entry point in this package is set to the code-tests library.

Other libraries can use this command to convert .test.ts files into .js files in the public/tests directory, but this one must build tests manually."

author: catapart
